item.title: 食品价格回落，赞比亚通胀降至 11 个月低点
item.description: 赞比亚的年通货膨胀率在 5 月份降至 11 个月以来的最低点，原因是降雨量的增加帮助抑制了玉米粉和蔬菜价格的上涨。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate eased to an 11-month low in May as improved rains helped cool price rises of corn meal and vegetables.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利否认荷兰检察官的逃税指控
item.description: 摩根士丹利否认了荷兰公诉机关关于该公司十多年前对价值近 10 亿美元的股息逃税的指控。【原文：Morgan Stanley denied allegations by the Dutch Public Prosecution Service that it evaded tax on almost $1 billion worth of dividends more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 里克索斯酒店集团通过 30 亿美元的卡塔尔项目押注海湾经济繁荣
item.description: Rixos 酒店集团的土耳其所有者正在将业务扩展到欧洲和中亚以外的海湾地区，在卡塔尔首都投资 30 亿美元。【原文：The Turkish owner of the Rixos Hotels is expanding beyond Europe and Central Asia to bet big on the Gulf with a $3 billion investment in Qatar’s capital.】

item.title: 印度央行从货币收益和利息收入中派发创纪录股息
item.description: 由于外汇交易收益和利息收入增加，印度中央银行向政府派发了创纪录的红利。【原文：India’s central bank gave a record dividend to the government as gains on foreign exchange transactions and interest income boosted its profit.】

item.title: 在激烈的市场竞争中，NTT Docomo 将以 29 亿美元收购 Net Bank
item.description: NTT Docomo 公司将以 4,200 亿日元（29 亿美元）的价格收购 SBI 控股公司的网上银行，以加强这家日本移动运营商在竞争激烈的市场中提供的金融服务。【原文：NTT Docomo Inc. is buying SBI Holdings Inc.’s online bank in a ¥420 billion ($2.9 billion) deal to shore up the Japanese mobile carrier’s financial offerings in a hyper-competitive market.】

item.title: 马科斯晋升领导逮捕杜特尔特的警官
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯提拔了一名曾领导逮捕其前任罗德里戈-杜特尔特的警官，作为近期选举受挫后更广泛的政府重组的一部分。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. promoted a police officer who led the arrest of his predecessor, Rodrigo Duterte, as part of a broader government reorganization following a setback in recent elections.】

item.title: 法院阻止全球关税后，特朗普的贸易战略遭到颠覆
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税战略陷入了混乱，因为美国一家法院罕见地斥责了他，阻止了他威胁对其他国家征收的许多进口税。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff strategy has been thrown into turmoil after a US court issued a rare rebuke blocking many of the import taxes he has threatened and imposed on other countries.】

item.title: 交易商权衡法院关税裁决，欧洲天然气走高
item.description: 由于市场猜测美国法院阻止唐纳德-特朗普总统征收关税的举措可能会提振能源需求，欧洲天然气走高。【原文：European natural gas inched higher on speculation that a move by a US court to block President Donald Trump’s tariffs may lift energy demand.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔被判行贿罪，罚款 20 万欧元
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔被认定犯有受贿罪，并被处以 20 万欧元（约合 22.538 万美元）的罚款，成为斯洛伐克首位被定罪的行长。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir was found guilty of bribery and handed a €200,000 fine ($225,380), becoming the first Slovak governor to get convicted.】

item.title: 瓜子发布 Kling 视频生成人工智能工具升级版
item.description: Kuaishou Technology 发布了 Kling 视频生成工具的升级版，以降低创建剪辑的成本和时间。【原文：Kuaishou Technology released an update to its Kling video-generation tool to reduce the cost and time to create clips.】

item.title: 日本赤泽将赴美参加最新一轮关税谈判
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世将前往华盛顿参加与美国的第四轮贸易谈判，这表明尽管美国法院裁定关税非法，但谈判仍将如期继续。【原文：Japan’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa is headed to Washington for his fourth round of trade negotiations with the US, signaling that talks will continue as expected despite a US court ruling that declared the tariffs illegal.】

item.title: 韩国交易所希望增加更多每周指数期权
item.description: 韩国的主要证券交易所正准备推出一系列短期衍生品，与亚洲其他证券交易所一起扩大此类工具的发行范围。【原文：South Korea’s main stock exchange is preparing to launch a range of short-term derivatives, joining other Asian bourses in expanding the offering of such instruments.】

item.title: 波兰傲视全球的反弹面临大选的现实考验
item.description: 本周末，波兰市场将经受考验，因为选民们将前往投票站，迎接总理唐纳德-图斯克面临的最大挑战。【原文：Revved-up Polish markets will be put to the test this weekend as voters head to the polls in the biggest challenge facing Premier Donald Tusk.】

item.title: 斯塔默指责法拉奇提出特拉斯式的 "幻想 "经济计划
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）预计将对他所描述的奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）的 "幻想经济学 "进行反击，这是工党首相认为他必须采取行动阻止英国改革在民意调查中飙升的最新迹象。【原文：Keir Starmer is expected to hit back at what he described as Nigel Farage’s “fantasy economics,” in the latest sign that the Labour prime minister believes he must act to arrest Reform UK’s surge in opinion polls.】

item.title: 南非准备降息刺激经济
item.description: 南非储备银行看来将在周四放宽借贷成本，以支持摇摇欲坠的经济，然后暂停评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战所带来的进一步影响。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank looks set to ease borrowing costs on Thursday to support a faltering economy, before pausing to assess any further fallout from US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 高盛敦促投资者购买黄金和石油作为长期对冲工具
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）在长期投资组合中将黄金和石油作为对冲通胀的工具，称金银作为避风港的吸引力在于人们对美国机构信誉和原油抵御供应冲击能力的担忧。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. touted gold and oil as hedges against inflation in long-term portfolios, citing the appeal of bullion as a haven amid concerns over US institutional credibility and crude’s ability to protect against supply shocks.】

item.title: 投资者抛弃黄金持有量，比特币 ETF 吸金 90 亿美元
item.description: 随着投资者从黄金转向所谓的数字货币--比特币，美国交易所交易基金出现了分化。【原文：A divergence is emerging in US exchange-traded funds as investors move from gold to its so-called digital counterpart, Bitcoin.】

item.title: 韩国股市延续大选前涨势创九个月新高
item.description: 由于投资者加大了对下周总统大选后更多降息和改革政策的押注，韩国股票基准指数升至近 10 个月来的最高点，接近牛市。【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark advanced to the highest in almost 10 months, nearing a bull market as investors heightened bets on more interest rate cuts and reform policies after the presidential election next week.】

item.title: 即使石油价格下跌导致现金流减少，阿美石油公司老板仍将继续借款

item.title: 欧洲国防业蓬勃发展，瑞典斯尼格尔公司计划上市

item.title: 特拉华州总检察长寻求银行为 OpenAI 重组提供建议
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，特拉华州总检察长正计划聘请一家投资银行，为其办公室审查 OpenAI 的重组计划提供建议，以吸引更多投资者。【原文：Delaware’s attorney general is planning to hire an investment bank that would advise her office as it examines OpenAI’s restructuring plans aimed at drawing more investors, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: K-Pop 巨头 Hybe 在北京设立办事处，进军中国市场
